content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Jordan makes to achieve her purpose of reaffirming the party’s mission and purpose.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Jordan makes to achieve her purpose of reaffirming the party’s mission and purpose.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
